description: System-generated unique identifier for an application configuration setting record.
System key or name used by the application to reference this configuration option.
Current configured value for the option; may store text, numeric, Boolean, or coded data depending on the setting.
Human-readable label shown to users for this configuration option.
Explanation of what the configuration option controls and how it should be used.
Identifier of the organization, tenant, or domain to which this setting applies, enabling domain-specific configurations.
Timestamp when the setting record was created.
Timestamp when the setting record was last updated.
Identifier of the user who created the setting record.
Identifier of the user who last modified the setting record.
